text: Are the leaves showing yellowing or discoloration?
Is there wilting of the central shoot?
Can you see any bore holes on the stem?
Is the dead heart easily pulled out?
Are there any foul odors from the affected area?
Did symptoms appear within 30 days of planting?
Are multiple shoots affected in the same clump?
Is there presence of frass or excreta?
Are the lower leaves still green while the top is dead?
Has there been recent heavy rainfall or irrigation?
